医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
NICER：用于基因编辑的 CRISPR/Cas9 的更安全替代方案基因编辑技术 CRISPR/Cas9 使研究人员能够对生物体的 DNA 进行精确且有效的改变，以修复导致遗传疾病的突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/NICER-A-safer-alternative-to-CRISPRCas9-for-gene-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/NICER-A-safer-alternative-to-CRISPRCas9-for-gene-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc554793-6c49-408d-a529-3c33f7c8b33e Fri, 15 Sep 2023 12:12:53 -0400 NICER: A safer alternative to CRISPR/Cas9 for gene editing
加州立法机关通过了州长纽瑟姆关于重组心理健康服务法案的提案加州立法机关通过了两项法案，批准了州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 修建 10,000 张新床位和住房以及增加毒瘾治疗的运动，作为应对该州无家可归和毒品危机的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/California-Legislature-passes-Gov-Newsome28099s-proposal-to-retool-mental-health-services-act.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/California-Legislature-passes-Gov-Newsome28099s-proposal-to-retool-mental-health-services-act.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56f6a6a7-39c2-4fe4-8768-b97bfb672d2a Fri, 15 Sep 2023 12:04:00 -0400 California Legislature passes Gov. Newsom’s proposal to retool mental health services act
Ducor Petrochemicals 推出符合 ISO 13485 认证的医疗保健和生命科学应用产品系列Ducor Petrochemicals 是聚丙烯塑料开发的全球合作伙伴，开发了专门用于生产医疗设备和其他生命科学应用的产品系列。 DuCare 产品系列经过 ISO 13485 认证，专为医疗保健和生命科学应用而设计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Ducor-Petrochemicals-launches-product-range-for-Healthcare-Life-Science-applications-under-ISO-13485-certification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Ducor-Petrochemicals-launches-product-range-for-Healthcare-Life-Science-applications-under-ISO-13485-certification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc08e360-094c-417f-b52b-9554632e1066 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 09:02:00 -0400 Ducor Petrochemicals launches product range for Healthcare & Life Science applications under ISO 13485 certification
专家为癌症相关疼痛患者提供阿片类药物管理指导治疗癌症相关疼痛的临床医生必须考虑是否以及如何向使用可卡因和甲基苯丙胺等非医疗兴奋剂的患者开阿片类药物；然而，没有与这些常见和具有挑战性的情况相关的指导方针。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Experts-provide-guidance-on-opioid-management-in-individuals-with-cancer-lated-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Experts-provide-guidance-on-opioid-management-in-individuals-with-cancer-lated-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2af833f0-ed3b-4136-8194-3392afca6753 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 08:59:00 -0400 Experts provide guidance on opioid management in individuals with cancer-related pain
母乳蛋白质与婴儿体内丰富的有益细菌有关哺乳动物经过3.2亿年的进化，已经使母乳能够满足婴儿的所有生理需求：它不仅含有营养物质，还含有激素、抗菌剂、消化酶和生长因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Breast-milk- Proteins-linked-to-abundance-of-beneficial-bacteria-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Breast-milk- Proteins-linked-to-abundance-of-beneficial-bacteria-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95f58864-db11-4bce-a6ca-a86306796450 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 08:58:00 -0400 Breast milk proteins linked to abundance of beneficial bacteria in infants
Oto 和 Lindus Health 启动远程试验，以增加患者接受耳鸣治疗的机会数字健康公司 Oto 和临床试验初创公司 Lindus Health 今天宣布启动一项完全远程的数字试验，以增加患者获得改变生活的耳鸣治疗的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Oto-and-Lindus-Health-launch-a-remote-trial-to-increase-病人-access-to-tinnitus-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Oto-and-Lindus-Health-launch-a-remote-trial-to-increase-病人-access-to-tinnitus-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=900a75e8-b3de-4165-b13b-57b27a2a56ae Fri, 15 Sep 2023 08:56:00 -0400 Oto and Lindus Health launch a remote trial to increase patient access to tinnitus therapy
幽门螺杆菌感染如何影响类风湿性关节炎？幽门螺杆菌感染与类风湿性关节炎（RA）之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/How-does-Helicobacter-pylori-infection-influence-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/How-does-Helicobacter-pylori-infection-influence-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7957b8ae-7a70-49cd-adf3-cd083a877cee Fri, 15 Sep 2023 08:56:00 -0400 How does Helicobacter pylori infection influence rheumatoid arthritis?
Nuvectis启动新抗癌药物1a期剂量递增临床试验爱丁堡大学发现并获得美国生物制药公司 Nuvectis Pharma, Inc. 许可的一种治疗难治性癌症的候选药物的临床试验已经开始。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Nuvectis-launches-Phase-1a-dose-escalation-clinical-trial-of-new-cancer-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Nuvectis-launches-Phase-1a-dose-escalation-clinical-trial-of-new-cancer-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2501ea0-39f2-4e81-9022-6257caff426b Fri, 15 Sep 2023 08:55:00 -0400 Nuvectis launches Phase 1a dose escalation clinical trial of new cancer drug
新的基因测试揭示了一个人幸福的倾向您的幸福水平不仅仅取决于外部事件。基因组测试可以揭示您的幸福感和乐观程度。一位领先的测试专家揭示了关键基因 CNR1 的变异如何对您的幸福水平产生重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/New-genic-test-reveals-a-persone28099s-predisposition-to-happiness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/New-genic-test-reveals-a-persone28099s-predisposition-to-happiness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8439823c-e71e-47bf-90b1-520cdd75be09 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 08:54:00 -0400 New genetic test reveals a person’s predisposition to happiness
ELRIG 英国宣布成立参与战略工作组英国欧洲实验室研究与创新小组 (ELRIG) 今天宣布成立其参与战略工作组 (ESWG)。该小组将提供战略方向和指导，以帮助确保 ELRIG 社区持续发展和繁荣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/ELRIG-UK-announces-the-formation-of-Engagement-Strategy-Work-Group.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/ELRIG-UK-announces-the-formation-of-Engagement-Strategy-Work-Group.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6a59941-e50c-489a-8c78-f5b8218bccf1 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 08:53:00 -0400 ELRIG UK announces the formation of Engagement Strategy Work Group
